A data transfer object (DTO) that provides filter options for tools, containing available types, categories, and platform categories for filtering tool collections.

## Key Components

- **ToolFilterResponse** - Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for automatic getters/setters/constructors
- **types** - List of available tool types for filtering
- **categories** - List of available tool categories for filtering  
- **platformCategories** - List of available platform categories for filtering

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating filter response with available options
ToolFilterResponse filterResponse = ToolFilterResponse.builder()
    .types(Arrays.asList("API", "CLI", "GUI"))
    .categories(Arrays.asList("Development", "Testing", "Monitoring"))
    .platformCategories(Arrays.asList("Web", "Mobile", "Desktop"))
    .build();

// Using in REST controller
@GetMapping("/tools/filters")
public ResponseEntity<ToolFilterResponse> getToolFilters() {
    ToolFilterResponse filters = toolService.getAvailableFilters();
    return ResponseEntity.ok(filters);
}

// Accessing filter options
List<String> availableTypes = filterResponse.getTypes();
List<String> availableCategories = filterResponse.getCategories();
```

The class uses Swagger annotations for API documentation and follows standard DTO patterns with builder support for flexible object construction.
